segments.text: I can't believe how calm the woman is while drying those dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and she doesn't even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring onto the floor, making a huge mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the children trying to get cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool that looks like it's about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting patiently for her cookie, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should pay more attention to what's going on around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so neat and tidy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a shame that the kitchen is in such disarray.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone cleans up that water before someone slips and falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children seem to be having fun, at least.
segments.speaker: PAR
